import React, {useRef,useState} from 'react' import {Fullscreen,Sidebar,Imaherr,Picker,Boardcont, Topbar, Circletop, Imatop,Sidebaar, Pinceld, Gomad, Imgdiv, Figurasd} from './PizarronElements' import Pincel from '../Images/pincel.png' import logo from '../Images/EBlogo.png' import Goma from '../Images/goma.png' import Figuras from '../Images/figuras.png' import Canvas from './Canvas' const BoardMain = () => { const[selectedColor, setSelectedColor] = useState("black"); const ref = useRef(null); return (
setSelectedColor(e.target.value)} />
setSelectedColor("white")} src={Goma}>
) } export default BoardMain
